H0.text: where are people who speak arabic from. Egypt

H1.text: where are people who speak arabic from. Saudi Arabia

H2.text: where are people who speak arabic from. Morocco

H3.text: where are people who speak arabic from. Iraq

A4.text: The official language of Egypt is Literary Arabic. The spoken languages are: Egyptian Arabic (68%), Sa'idi Arabic (29%), Eastern Egyptian Bedawi Arabic (1.6%), Sudanese Arabic (0.6%), Domari (0.3%), Nobiin (0.3%), Beja (0.1%), Siwi and others.
